Featured Webinar

Google Analytics 101: Maximizing Your Website Traffic's Potential

Elevate your law firm's SEO game by enhancing your Google Analytics (GA4) knowledge in our upcoming webinar. Discover how to utilize key features like data tracking for your website’s traffic, page performance, and more to understand your website’s online presence holistically as we walk you through the interface top to bottom. Whether you're a seasoned attorney or just starting out, this session will give you a better understanding of Google Analytics and how you can use it to assess your site’s health and performance.

From the Desk of Justia

Justia Webinars: Attorneys’ Duties Towards Clients When Using Technology

With today’s digitally-driven landscape, lawyers increasingly rely on various technologies to improve efficiency, accuracy, and client service. As technology becomes more crucial to your day-to-day duties, so too do your responsibilities and the ethical standards that need to be maintained. As they say, with great power comes great responsibility!

Justia Team | April 16, 2024

News and Notes From Google Local Services Ads: April 2024

Attention lawyers using Google Local Services Ads! Stay ahead of the curve with the latest updates for legal practices. This post focuses on key changes and adjustments highlighted in the Google Partner newsletter, keeping you informed about what matters most for your Google Local Services marketing strategy.

Justia Amplify Team | April 23, 2024

Justia Legal Resources: DUI/DWI Law Center

Drunk driving costs far too many lives each year. People convicted of DUI or DWI may face severe consequences. The DUI & DWI Law Center in the Justia Legal Guides explains the basics of the law in this area.

Chris Skelton | April 23, 2024
